Package main.java.warzone.services

Interface GameMapDataHandler

All Known Implementing Classes:
ConquestAdapter, DominationMapDataHandlerImpl
public interface GameMapDataHandler
Interface for managing main.java.game map data. Defines methods to create and save main.java.game environments, including continents, countries, and borders. Provides functionality to handle main.java.game map data, such as reading from an input stream and writing to an output stream. Implementations of this interface are responsible for parsing map data and manipulating it for the Warzone main.java.game. Methods include creating a main.java.game environment from an input stream and saving the current main.java.game environment to an output stream.
Version:
1.0.0

  • Method Details

    • makeGameSession

      void makeGameSession(InputStream p_InputStream) throws WarzoneRuntimeException, WarzoneValidationException
      Generates a game session from the provided input stream.
      Parameters:
      p_InputStream - The input stream representing the game session data.
      Throws:
      WarzoneRuntimeException - If the file representing the game session data is not found.
      WarzoneValidationException - If there's a validation error while processing the game session data.

    • saveGameSession

      void saveGameSession(String p_GameSessionFileName)
      Saves the current game session to a specified file.
      Parameters:
      p_GameSessionFileName - The name of the file to which the game session data should be saved.
